sentences.sContent: Consumers will soon be paying higher airfares.
sentences.sCn: 不久消费者就要支付更高的机票价了。

sentences.sContent: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ) .
sentences.sCn: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.sContent: Consumer demand led to higher imports of manufactured goods.
sentences.sCn: 消费者需求促使制造商品的进口量增加了。

sentences.sContent: Consumer spending was down by 0.1% last month.
sentences.sCn: 上个月消费支出下降了0.1%。
给予消费者建议的信息来源

sentences.sContent: ...The consumer was ultimately to be mentioned as well...
...Chinese entrepreneurs are also striving to be pioneers in innovation to satisfy the changing and growing demands of both domestic and foreign consumer markets...
...Those dangers can be addressed with farmer and consumer education...
...it seems that consumers are growing more uneasy about handing over the massive amounts of consumer data needed to provide the personalized...
...Says Robertson: When you get the consumer into a position of worry and inconvenience...
...But the consumer sentiment index remains weak...
...as well as market and consumer wastage...
...characteristics associated with modern consumer culture mean produce is often wasted through retail and customer behaviour...
...Governments in developed nations devise and implement policy that changes consumer expectations...
